Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the all player hands in the game in the model.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Hand[] playerHands
      playerHands: an array of player hands, representing player seat numbers and turn order.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Table(int players)
      Purpose: builds Table with the given number of player hands.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card getPlayersCard(int seat, int position)
      Purpose: Returns the card from the given player's hand at the given index.
      void giveCard(int seat)
      Purpose: Adds a card with the given rank and suit to the user's hand.
      void giveCard(int seat, char colour, char number)
      Purpose: Adds a card with the given rank and suit to the chosen player's hand.
      void informCard(int seat, java.lang.String type, char info)
      Purpose: Set the inform flags on the given player's cards.
      void informCard(int seat, java.lang.String type, char info, java.lang.String[] positions)
      Purpose: Set the card information and inform flags on the user's cards.
      void removeCard(int seat, int cardPosition)
      Purpose: Removes a card at the given position from the given player hand.

        public void giveCard(int seat,
                     char colour,
                     char number)
        Purpose: Adds a card with the given rank and suit to the chosen player's hand.
        Parameters:
        seat - the player to receive the card.
        colour - the colour of the new card.
        number - the number of the new card.

        Purpose: Adds a card with the given rank and suit to the user's hand.
        Parameters:

      • removeCard

        public void removeCard(int seat,
                       int cardPosition)
        Purpose: Removes a card at the given position from the given player hand.
        Parameters:
        seat - the player hand to remove the card from.
        cardPosition - the position of the card in the player's hand.

      • informCard

        public void informCard(int seat,
                       java.lang.String type,
                       char info)
        Purpose: Set the inform flags on the given player's cards.
        Parameters:
        seat - the player who was informed.
        type - the type of the inform done.
        info - the information that was informed.

      • informCard

        public void informCard(int seat,
                       java.lang.String type,
                       char info,
                       java.lang.String[] positions)
        Purpose: Set the card information and inform flags on the user's cards.
        Parameters:
        seat - the player who was informed.
        type - the type of the inform done.
        info - the information that was informed.
        positions - the positions of the cards that were informed.

      • getPlayersCard

        public Card getPlayersCard(int seat,
                           int position)
        Purpose: Returns the card from the given player's hand at the given index.
        Parameters:
        seat - the player whose hand contains the desired card.
        position - the position of the card in the hand.
        Returns:
        the card.
